title: Breaking Bad
summary: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer partners with a former student to enter the criminal underworld.

title: Narcos
summary: The true story of Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels, focusing on Pablo Escobar and the DEA's efforts to bring him down.

title: Ozark
summary: A financial planner relocates his family to the Ozarks after a money-laundering scheme goes wrong and faces growing threats from local criminals.

title: Mindhunter
summary: Two FBI agents pioneer the field of criminal profiling as they study and interview serial killers to understand their motives.

title: Peaky Blinders
summary: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centered on the Shelby family and their ambitions for power and influence.

title: Sherlock
summary: Modern-day Sherlock Holmes solves crimes in London, accompanied by his loyal friend, Dr. John Watson.

title: True Detective
summary: Anthology series where each season follows a new cast of detectives and their struggles to solve horrifying cases.

title: Broadchurch
summary: Detectives investigate the death of a young boy in a small coastal town, uncovering secrets and lies among its residents.

title: The Mentalist
summary: A former psychic uses his keen observational skills to solve crimes and track down the man who murdered his family.

title: Luther
summary: A brilliant but emotionally impulsive detective battles personal demons while solving complex murder cases in London.

title: The Sopranos
summary: The life of Tony Soprano, a mob boss trying to balance the demands of his family life with his criminal organization.

title: Boardwalk Empire
summary: The story of Enoch 'Nucky' Thompson, a political figure who rises to prominence and controls Atlantic City's bootlegging industry during Prohibition.

title: The Godfather of Harlem
summary: Bumpy Johnson returns from prison to find his neighborhood controlled by the Italian mob and decides to reclaim his territory.

title: Gomorrah
summary: The inside story of the Camorra, a powerful Neapolitan crime syndicate, and its impact on local families.

title: Animal Kingdom
summary: A teenager moves in with his estranged relatives who run a criminal enterprise, becoming entangled in their violent operations.

title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
summary: An ensemble comedy following the detectives of Brooklyn's 99th precinct as they solve cases and navigate their eccentric personal lives.

title: The Wire
summary: Explores the interconnected lives of law enforcement, criminals, and residents in Baltimore, exposing the complexities of modern urban life.

title: Line of Duty
summary: Follows the investigations of AC-12, a unit tasked with uncovering police corruption in the UK.

title: The Rookie
summary: The journey of the LAPD's oldest rookie, John Nolan, as he navigates the challenges of his new career.

title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
summary: Follows a team of forensic scientists as they solve crimes using cutting-edge technology and old-fashioned detective work.
